title.narrative: Front Line Defenders - Protection Support for Women Human Rights Defenders 2019-2021

description.narrative:
Front Line Defenders - Support for Women Human Rights Defenders
The strategic objective for the grant is to ensure that women human rights defenders at local and national level are recognised as essential actors in the struggle for human rights and enjoy freedom and security to undertake their legitimate activities.
Front Line Defenders has substantial experience in supporting human rights defenders and has established itself as a leading organisation on HRD protection having pioneered work on rapid, practical support, digital security and psychosocial support. It serves as the lead partner in EU Human Rights Defenders mechanism.
Find more here: https://www.frontlinedefenders.org/

To ensure that women human rights defenders at local and national level are recognised as essential actors in the struggle for human rights and enjoy the Freedom and security to undertake their legitimate activities.
